00019 /* When appropriate, alloca is cleaner than malloc/free.  The storage
00020  * is freed automatically on return from a function. When using gcc the
00021  * builtin version is much faster. */
00022 #ifdef __GNUC__
00023 # undef alloca
00024 # define alloca(x) __builtin_alloca((x))
00025 #else
00026 /* this is necessary (and sufficient) for Solaris 10: */
00027 # ifdef __sun
00028 #  include <alloca.h>
00029 # endif
00030 #endif

00036 #define AZERO(x, n) {int _I_, _SZ_ = (n); for(_I_ = 0; _I_ < _SZ_; _I_++) (x)[_I_] = 0;}

00080 static R_INLINE double sqr_length(const double *x, int n)
00081 {
00082     double ans = 0;
00083     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) ans += x[i] * x[i];
00084     return ans;
00085 }

00099 static R_INLINE double*
00100 apply_perm(double *dest, const double *src, const int *perm, int n)
00101 {
00102     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) dest[i] = src[perm ? perm[i] : i];
00103     return dest;
00104 }
00105 
00118 static R_INLINE double*
00119 apply_iperm(double *dest, const double *src, const int *perm, int n)
00120 {
00121     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) dest[perm ? perm[i] : i] = src[i];
00122     return dest;
00123 }

00133 static R_INLINE int Gp_grp(int ind, int nf, const int *Gp)
00134 {
00135     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) if (ind < Gp[i + 1]) return i;
00136     error(_("invalid row index %d (max is %d)"), ind, Gp[nf]);
00137     return -1;                  /* -Wall */
00138 }

00151 static R_INLINE double *SLOT_REAL_NULL(SEXP obj, SEXP nm)
00152 {
00153     SEXP pt = GET_SLOT(obj, nm);
00154     return LENGTH(pt) ? REAL(pt) : (double*) NULL;
00155 }

00168 static R_INLINE double
00169 get_sigma(int REML, const int* dims, const double* d)
00170 {
00171     return (dims[useSc_POS] ? 
00172             sqrt(d[pwrss_POS] / (dims[n_POS] -
00173                             (REML ? dims[p_POS] : 0))) : 1);
00174 }
00175 
00189 static int                      /* populate the st, nc and nlev arrays */
00190 ST_nc_nlev(const SEXP ST, const int *Gp, double **st, int *nc, int *nlev)
00191 {
00192     int ans = 0, i, nf = LENGTH(ST);
00193 
00194     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00195         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00196         int nci = *INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
00197 
00198         if (nci > ans) ans = nci;
00199         if (st) st[i] = REAL(STi);
00200         nc[i] = nci;
00201         nlev[i] = (Gp[i + 1] - Gp[i])/nci;
00202     }
00203     return ans;
00204 }

00221 static int
00222 C_nz_col(int *nz, int j, int nf, const int *Gp, const int *nc,
00223        const int *nlev, const int *zi, const int *zp)
00224 {
00225     int ans, i, p;
00226 
00227     AZERO(nz, Gp[nf]);
00228     for (p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++) {
00229         int zrow = zi[p];
00230         int k = Gp_grp(zrow, nf, Gp);
00231 
00232         nz[zrow] = 1;           /* T contains the identity */
00233         if (nc[k] > 1) {
00234             int nextra = (zrow - Gp[k]) / nlev[k];
00235             for (i = 1; i <= nextra; i++)
00236                 nz[zrow - i * nlev[k]] = 1;
00237         }
00238     }
00239     for (i = 0, ans = 0; i < Gp[nf]; i++) if (nz[i]) ans++;
00240     return ans;
00241 }

00253 static void update_ranef(SEXP x)
00254 {
00255     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
00256     int *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym)),
00257         *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym)),
00258         i, i1 = 1, k, nf = LENGTH(ST),
00259         p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00260     double *b = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym)),
00261         *u = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uSym)), one = 1;
00262     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00263     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00264     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00265     R_CheckStack(); 
00266 
00267     if (!SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtXWtSym)) { /* LMM */
00268         double *rx = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym)),
00269             *rzx = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RCXySym)),
00270             *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
00271             *fixef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)),
00272             mone = -1, one = 1;
00273         CHM_DN cu = N_AS_CHM_DN(u, q, 1), sol;
00274         R_CheckStack();
00275                                 /* solve RX beta-hat = del2 */
00276         F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, rx, &p, fixef, &i1);
00277         F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, &mone, rzx, &q,
00278                         fixef, &i1, &one, u, &i1);
00279         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, cu, &c)))
00280             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed:"));
00281         Memcpy(u, (double*)(sol->x), q);
00282         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00283         d[usqr_POS] = sqr_length(u, q);
00284         d[wrss_POS] = d[disc_POS] = d[pwrss_POS] - d[usqr_POS];
00285     }
00286     ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00287                                 /* inverse permutation */
00288     for (i = 0; i < q; i++) b[((int*)L->Perm)[i]] = u[i];
00289     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00290         for (k = 0; k < nc[i]; k++) { /* multiply by \tilde{S}_i */
00291             double dd = st[i][k * (nc[i] + 1)];
00292             int base = Gp[i] + k * nlev[i], kk;
00293             for (kk = 0; kk < nlev[i]; kk++) b[base + kk] *= dd;
00294         }
00295         if (nc[i] > 1) {        /* multiply by \tilde{T}_i */
00296             F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nlev + i, nc + i, &one,
00297                             st[i], nc + i, b + Gp[i], nlev + i);
00298         }
00299     }
00300 }
00301 
00311 SEXP mer_ST_initialize(SEXP ST, SEXP Gpp, SEXP Zt)
00312 {
00313     int *Gp = INTEGER(Gpp),
00314         *Zdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym)),
00315         *zi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_iSym)),
00316         i, j, k, nf = LENGTH(ST);
00317     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int),
00318         nnz = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_pSym))[Zdims[1]];
00319     double *rowsqr = Alloca(Zdims[0], double),
00320         **st = Alloca(nf, double*),
00321         *zx = REAL(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_xSym));
00322     R_CheckStack();
00323     
00324     ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00325     AZERO(rowsqr, Zdims[0]);
00326     for (i = 0; i < nnz; i++) rowsqr[zi[i]] += zx[i] * zx[i];
00327     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00328         AZERO(st[i], nc[i] * nc[i]);
00329         for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++) {
00330             double *stij = st[i] + j * (nc[i] + 1);
00331             for (k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++)
00332                 *stij += rowsqr[Gp[i] + j * nlev[i] + k];
00333             *stij = sqrt(nlev[i]/(0.375 * *stij));
00334         }
00335     }
00336     return R_NilValue;
00337 }

00347 static double *ST_getPars(SEXP x, double *pars)
00348 {
00349     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
00350     int i, nf = LENGTH(ST), pos = 0;
00351     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00352         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00353         double *st = REAL(STi);
00354         int nci = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol))[0];
00355         int j, k, ncp1 = nci + 1;
00356 
00357         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++)
00358             pars[pos++] = st[j * ncp1];
00359         for (j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
00360             for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
00361                 pars[pos++] = st[k + j * nci];
00362     }
00363     return pars;
00364 }

00373 SEXP mer_ST_getPars(SEXP x)
00374 {
00375     SEXP ans =
00376         PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, 
00377                             INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym))[np_POS]));
00378     ST_getPars(x, REAL(ans));
00379     UNPROTECT(1); 
00380     return ans;
00381 }
00382 
00390 static void
00391 ST_setPars(SEXP x, const double *pars)
00392 {
00393     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
00394     int *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym));
00395     CHM_SP cC = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym)),
00396         cZt = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ZtSym));
00397     int *vi = (int*)(cC->i), *vp = (int*)(cC->p),
00398         *zi = (int*)(cZt->i), *zp = (int*)(cZt->p),
00399         i, j, ncmax, nf = LENGTH(ST), p, pos = 0;
00400     int vnnz = vp[cC->ncol], znnz = zp[cZt->ncol];
00401     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00402     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*),
00403         *vx = (double*)(cC->x), *zx = (double*)(cZt->x),
00404         one[] = {1,0};
00405     R_CheckStack();
00406 
00407     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00408                                 /* install the parameters in the ST slot */
00409     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00410         int j, k, nci = nc[i], ncp1 = nc[i] + 1;
00411         double *sti = st[i];
00412 
00413         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++)
00414             sti[j * ncp1] = pars[pos++];
00415         for (j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
00416             for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
00417                 sti[k + j * nci] = pars[pos++];
00418     }
00419                                 /* Copy Z' to V' unless V' has nonzero
00420                                  * positions not in Z' */ 
00421     if (vnnz == znnz) Memcpy(vx, zx, znnz); 
00422     else { /* Only occurs in nonlinear models with correlated random effects */
00423         AZERO(vx, vnnz);        /* Initialize the potential nonzeros to 0 */
00424         for (j = 0; j < cC->ncol; j++) { /* Iterate over columns */
00425             int pv = vp[j];
00426             for (p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++) { /* nonzeros in Z' */
00427                 while (vi[pv] < zi[p]) pv++;      /* matching pos in V' */
00428                 if (vi[pv] != zi[p])
00429                     error(_("nonconforming Zt and C structures, j = %d"), j);
00430                 vx[pv] = zx[p];
00431             }
00432         }
00433     }
00434                                 /* When T != I multiply C on the left by T' */
00435     if (ncmax > 1)              /* T' == I when ncmax == 1 */
00436         for (j = 0; j < cC->ncol; j++) /* multiply column j by T' */
00437             for (p = vp[j]; p < vp[j + 1];) {
00438                 int i = Gp_grp(vi[p], nf, Gp);
00439 
00440                 if (nc[i] <= 1) p++;
00441                 else {
00442                     int nr = p; /* number of rows in `B' in dtrmm call */
00443                     while ((vi[nr] - Gp[i]) < nlev[i]) nr++;
00444                     nr -= p;    /* nr == 1 except in models with carry-over */
00445                     F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "N", "U", &nr, nc + i,
00446                                     one, st[i], nc + i, vx + p, &nr);
00447                     p += (nr * nc[i]);
00448                 }
00449             }
00450                                 /* Multiply C on the left by S */
00451     for (p = 0; p < vnnz; p++) {
00452         int i = Gp_grp(vi[p], nf, Gp);
00453         vx[p] *= st[i][((vi[p] - Gp[i]) / nlev[i]) * (nc[i] + 1)];
00454     }
00455 }

00469 
00470     if (!isReal(pars) || LENGTH(pars) != npar)
00471         error(_("pars must be a real vector of length %d"), npar);
00472     ST_setPars(x, REAL(pars));
00473     return R_NilValue;

00484 SEXP mer_sigma(SEXP x, SEXP which)
00485 {
00486     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym)),
00487         w = LENGTH(which) ? asInteger(which) : 0;
00488     
00489     return ScalarReal(get_sigma(w < 0 || (!w && dims[isREML_POS]), dims,
00490                                 REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym))));
00491 }
00492 
00500 SEXP mer_postVar(SEXP x)
00501 {
00502     int *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym)),
00503         *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00504     int nf = dims[nf_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00505     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, nf));
00506     int i, j, k;
00507     double *vv, one[] = {1,0}, sc;
00508     CHM_SP sm1, sm2;
00509     CHM_DN dm1;
00510     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00511     int *Perm = (int*)(L->Perm), *iperm = Alloca(q, int),
00512         *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00513     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00514     R_CheckStack();
00515 
00516     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00517     for (j = 0; j < q; j++) iperm[Perm[j]] = j; /* inverse permutation */
00518     sc = get_sigma(dims[isREML_POS], dims, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)));
00519     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00520         int ncisqr = nc[i] * nc[i];
00521         CHM_SP rhs = M_cholmod_allocate_sparse(q, nc[i], nc[i],
00522                                                1/*sorted*/, 1/*packed*/,
00523                                                0/*stype*/, CHOLMOD_REAL, &c);
00524 
00525         SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, i, alloc3DArray(REALSXP, nc[i], nc[i], nlev[i]));
00526         vv = REAL(VECTOR_ELT(ans, i));
00527         for (j = 0; j <= nc[i]; j++) ((int *)(rhs->p))[j] = j;
00528         for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
00529             ((double *)(rhs->x))[j] = st[i][j * (nc[i] + 1)] * sc;
00530         for (k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++) {
00531             double *vvk = vv + k * ncisqr;
00532             for (j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
00533                 ((int*)(rhs->i))[j] = iperm[Gp[i] + k + j * nlev[i]];
00534             sm1 = M_cholmod_spsolve(CHOLMOD_L, L, rhs, &c);
00535             sm2 = M_cholmod_transpose(sm1, 1 /*values*/, &c);
00536             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c);
00537             sm1 = M_cholmod_aat(sm2, (int*)NULL, (size_t)0, 1 /*mode*/, &c);
00538             dm1 = M_cholmod_sparse_to_dense(sm1, &c);
00539             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c); M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm2, &c);
00540             Memcpy(vvk, (double*)(dm1->x), ncisqr);
00541             M_cholmod_free_dense(&dm1, &c);
00542             if (nc[i] > 1) {
00543                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("L", "L", "N", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
00544                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
00545                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
00546                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
00547             }
00548         }
00549         M_cholmod_free_sparse(&rhs, &c);
00550     }
00551     UNPROTECT(1);
00552     return ans;
00553 }
00554 
00563 SEXP mer_create_L(SEXP CmP)
00564 {
00565     double one[] = {1, 0};
00566     CHM_SP Cm = AS_CHM_SP(CmP);
00567     CHM_FR L;
00568     R_CheckStack();
00569 
00570     L = M_cholmod_analyze(Cm, &c);
00571     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(Cm, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00572         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00573               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00574 
00575     return M_chm_factor_to_SEXP(L, 1);
00576 }
00577 
00578 
00579 /* Utilities and constants for generalized linear models */
00580 
00581 static const double LTHRESH = 30.;
00582 static const double MLTHRESH = -30.;
00583 static double MPTHRESH = 0;
00584 static double PTHRESH = 0;
00585 static const double INVEPS = 1/DOUBLE_EPS;
00586 
00587 static void
00588 lme4_muEta(double* mu, double* muEta, const double* eta, int n, int typ)
00589 {
00590     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) { /* apply the generalized linear part */
00591         double etai = eta[i], tmp;
00592         switch(typ) {
00593         case 1:         /* logit */
00594             tmp = (etai < MLTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00595             ((etai > LTHRESH) ? INVEPS : exp(etai));
00596             mu[i] = tmp/(1 + tmp);
00597             muEta[i] = mu[i] * (1 - mu[i]);
00598             break;
00599         case 2:         /* probit */
00600             if (!MPTHRESH) {
00601                 MPTHRESH = qnorm5(DOUBLE_EPS, 0, 1, 1, 0);
00602                 PTHRESH = -MPTHRESH;
00603             }
00604             mu[i] = (etai < MPTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00605                 ((etai > PTHRESH) ? 1 - DOUBLE_EPS :
00606                  pnorm5(etai, 0, 1, 1, 0));
00607             tmp = dnorm4(eta[i], 0, 1, 0);
00608             muEta[i] = (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00609             break;
00610         case 3:         /* cauchit */
00611             error(_("cauchit link not yet coded"));
00612             break;
00613         case 4:         /* cloglog */
00614             error(_("cloglog link not yet coded"));
00615             break;
00616         case 5:         /* identity */
00617             mu[i] = eta[i];
00618             muEta[i] = 1.;
00619             break;
00620         case 6:         /* log */
00621             tmp = exp(eta[i]);
00622             muEta[i] = mu[i] =
00623                 (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00624             break;
00625         case 7:         /* sqrt */
00626             mu[i] = etai * etai;
00627             muEta[i] = 2 * etai;
00628             break;
00629         default:
00630             error(_("General form of glmer_linkinv not yet written"));
00631         }
00632     }
00633 }
00634 
00635 static void
00636 lme4_varFunc(double* var, const double* mu, int n, int vTyp)
00637 {
00638     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00639         double mui = mu[i];
00640         switch(vTyp) {
00641         case 1:                 /* constant variance */
00642             var[i] = 1.;
00643             break;
00644         case 2:                 /* mu(1-mu) variance */
00645             if (mui <= 0 || mui >= 1)
00646                 error(_("mu[i] must be in the range (0,1): mu = %g, i = %d"),
00647                       mu, i);
00648             var[i] = mui * (1 - mui);
00649             break;
00650         case 3:                 /* mu variance */
00651             if (mui <= 0)
00652                 error(_("mu[i] must be positive: mu = %g, i = %d"), mu, i);
00653             var[i] = mui;
00654             break;
00655         case 4:                 /* mu^2 variance */
00656             if (mui <= 0)
00657                 error(_("mu[i] must be positive: mu = %g, i = %d"), mu, i);
00658             var[i] = mui * mui;
00659             break;
00660         case 5:                 /* mu^3 variance */
00661             if (mui <= 0)
00662                 error(_("mu[i] must be positive: mu = %g, i = %d"), mu, i);
00663             var[i] = mui * mui * mui;
00664             break;
00665         default:
00666             error(_("Unknown vTyp value %d"), vTyp);
00667         }
00668     }
00669 }
00670 
00679 static R_INLINE double y_log_y(double y, double mu)
00680 {
00681     return (y) ? (y * log(y/mu)) : 0;
00682 }
00683 
00684 static double
00685 lme4_devResid(const double* mu, const double* pWt, const double* y,
00686               int n, int vTyp)
00687 {
00688     double ans = 0.;
00689     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00690         double mui = mu[i], wi = pWt ? pWt[i] : 1, yi = y[i];
00691         double ri = yi - mui;
00692         switch(vTyp) {
00693         case 1:                 /* constant variance */
00694             ans += wi * ri * ri;
00695             break;
00696         case 2:                 /* mu(1-mu) variance */
00697             ans += 2 * wi *
00698                 (y_log_y(yi, mui) + y_log_y(1 - yi, 1 - mui));
00699             break;
00700         case 3:                 /* mu variance */
00701             ans += 2 * wi * (y_log_y(yi, mui) - (yi - mui));
00702             break;
00703         case 4:                 /* mu^2 variance */
00704             ans += 2 * wi * (y_log_y(yi, mui) - (yi - mui)/mui);
00705             break;
00706         case 5:                 /* mu^3 variance */
00707             ans += wi * (ri * ri)/(yi * mui * mui);
00708             break;
00709         default:
00710             error(_("Unknown vTyp value %d"), vTyp);
00711         }
00712     }
00713     return ans;
00714 }
00715 
00725 static double update_mu(SEXP x)
00726 {
00727     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00728     int i, i1 = 1, n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS], s = dims[s_POS];
00729     int ns = n * s;
00730     double *V = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_VSym),
00731         *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
00732         *eta = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_etaSym)),
00733         *etaold = (double*) NULL,
00734         *mu = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym)),
00735         *muEta = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
00736         *offset = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_offsetSym),
00737         *srwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtrWtSym),
00738         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)),
00739         *var = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_varSym),
00740         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
00741         one[] = {1,0};
00742     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00743     CHM_SP cC = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
00744     CHM_DN Ptu, ceta, cu = AS_CHM_DN(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uSym));
00745     R_CheckStack();
00746 
00747     if (V) {
00748         etaold = eta;
00749         eta = Calloc(ns, double);
00750     }
00751                                 /* eta := offset or eta := 0 */
00752     for (i = 0; i < ns; i++) eta[i] = offset ? offset[i] : 0;
00753                                 /* eta := eta + X \beta */
00754     F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &ns, &p, one,
00755                     REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_XSym)), &ns,
00756                     REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)), &i1,
00757                     one, eta, &i1);
00758                                 /* eta := eta + C' P' u */
00759     Ptu = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Pt, L, cu, &c);
00760     ceta = N_AS_CHM_DN(eta, ns, 1);
00761     R_CheckStack();
00762     if (!M_cholmod_sdmult(cC, 1 /* trans */, one, one, Ptu, ceta, &c))
00763         error(_("cholmod_sdmult error returned"));
00764     M_cholmod_free_dense(&Ptu, &c);
00765 
00766     if (V) {            /* evaluate the nonlinear model */
00767         SEXP pnames = VECTOR_ELT(GET_DIMNAMES(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_VSym)), 1),
00768             gg, rho = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_envSym), vv;
00769         int *gdims;
00770         
00771         if (!isString(pnames) || LENGTH(pnames) != s)
00772             error(_("Slot V must be a matrix with %d named columns"), s);
00773         for (i = 0; i < s; i++) { /* par. vals. into env. */
00774             vv = findVarInFrame(rho,
00775                                 install(CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i))));
00776             if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00777                 error(_("Parameter %s in the environment must be a length %d numeric vector"),
00778                       CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i)), n);
00779             Memcpy(REAL(vv), eta + i * n, n);
00780         }
00781         vv = PROTECT(eval(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_nlmodelSym), rho));
00782         if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00783             error(_("evaluated model is not a numeric vector of length %d"), n);
00784         gg = getAttrib(vv, lme4_gradientSym);
00785         if (!isReal(gg) || !isMatrix(gg))
00786             error(_("gradient attribute of evaluated model must be a numeric matrix"));
00787         gdims = INTEGER(getAttrib(gg, R_DimSymbol));
00788         if (gdims[0] != n ||gdims[1] != s)
00789             error(_("gradient matrix must be of size %d by %d"), n, s);
00790                                 /* colnames of the gradient
00791                                  * corresponding to the order of the
00792                                  * pnames has been checked */
00793         Free(eta);
00794         eta = etaold;
00795         Memcpy(eta, REAL(vv), n);
00796         Memcpy(V, REAL(gg), ns);
00797         UNPROTECT(1);
00798     }
00799 
00800     if (muEta) {
00801         lme4_muEta(mu, muEta, eta, n, dims[lTyp_POS]);
00802         lme4_varFunc(var, mu, n, dims[vTyp_POS]);
00803     } else {
00804         Memcpy(mu, eta, n);
00805     }
00806 
00807     d[wrss_POS] = 0;            /* update resid slot and d[wrss_POS] */
00808     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00809         res[i] = (y[i] - mu[i]) * (srwt ? srwt[i] : 1);
00810         d[wrss_POS] += res[i] * res[i];
00811     }
00812                                 /* store u'u */
00813     d[usqr_POS] = sqr_length((double*)(cu->x), dims[q_POS]);
00814     return (d[pwrss_POS] = d[usqr_POS] + d[wrss_POS]);
00815 }
00816 
00827 SEXP mer_update_mu(SEXP x)
00828 {
00829     return ScalarReal(update_mu(x));
00830 }
00831 
00842 static double update_L(SEXP x)
00843 {
00844     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00845     int n = dims[n_POS], s = dims[s_POS];
00846     double
00847         *V = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_VSym),
00848         *cx = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_CxSym),
00849         *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
00850         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)),
00851         *mu = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym)),
00852         *muEta = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym),
00853         *pwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_pWtSym),
00854         *sXwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtXWtSym),
00855         *srwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtrWtSym),
00856         *var =  SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_varSym),
00857         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
00858         one[] = {1,0};
00859     CHM_SP A = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
00860     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00861     R_CheckStack();
00862     
00863     if (var || pwt) {      /* Update srwt and res. Reevaluate wrss. */
00864         d[wrss_POS] = 0;
00865         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00866             srwt[j] = sqrt((pwt ? pwt[j] : 1) / var[j]);
00867             res[j] = srwt[j] * (y[j] - mu[j]);
00868             d[wrss_POS] += res[j] * res[j];
00869         }
00870     }
00871     if (sXwt) {                 /* Update sXwt and C */
00872         int *ai = (int*)A->i, *ap = (int*)A->p, i, j;
00873         double *ax = (double*)(A->x);
00874         CHM_SP C = A;
00875 
00876         for (j = 0; j < s; j++) {
00877             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00878                 int ja = i + j * n;
00879                 sXwt[ja] = (srwt ? srwt[i] : 1) *
00880                     (muEta ? muEta[i] : 1) *
00881                     (V ? V[ja] : 1);
00882             }
00883         }
00884         if (s == 1) {           /* C is a scaled version of A */
00885             for (j = 0; j < n; j++)
00886                 for (int p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
00887                     cx[p] = ax[p] * sXwt[j];
00888             A->x = (void*)cx;
00889         } else {
00890             int *ci, *cp, pa, pc;
00891             C = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym));
00892             R_CheckStack();
00893 
00894             ci = (int*)C->i; cp = (int*)C->p; cx = (double*)C->x;
00895             AZERO(cx, cp[n]);
00896             for (j = 0; j < s; j++)
00897                 for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00898                     int ja = i + j * n;
00899                     for (pa = ap[ja]; pa < ap[ja + 1]; pa++) {
00900                         for (pc = cp[i]; pc < cp[i + 1]; pc++)
00901                             if (ci[pc] == ai[pa]) break;
00902                         if (pc >= cp[i + 1])
00903                             error(_("Structure of Cm and A are not consistent"));
00904                         cx[pc] += ax[pa] * sXwt[ja];
00905                     }
00906                 }
00907             A = C;
00908         }
00909     }
00910 
00911     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(A, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00912         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00913               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00914 
00915     d[ldL2_POS] = 0;            /* evaluate log(det(L))^2 */
00916     if (L->is_super) {
00917         int i;
00918         for (i = 0; i < L->nsuper; i++) {
00919             int j, nrp1 = 1 + ((int *)(L->pi))[i + 1] - ((int *)(L->pi))[i],
00920                 nc = ((int *)(L->super))[i + 1] - ((int *)(L->super))[i];
00921             double *x = (double *)(L->x) + ((int *)(L->px))[i];
00922 
00923             for (j = 0; j < nc; j++) {
00924                 d[ldL2_POS] += 2 * log(fabs(x[j * nrp1]));
00925             }
00926         }
00927     } else {
00928         int *li = (int*)(L->i), *lp = (int*)(L->p), j, p;
00929         double *lx = (double *)(L->x);
00930         
00931         for (j = 0; j < L->n; j++) {
00932             for (p = lp[j]; li[p] != j && p < lp[j + 1]; p++) {};
00933             if (li[p] != j) break; /* what happened to the diagonal element? */
00934             d[ldL2_POS] += log(lx[p] * ((L->is_ll) ? lx[p] : 1.));
00935         }
00936     }
00937     return (d[pwrss_POS] = d[usqr_POS] + d[wrss_POS]);
00938 }
00939 
00951 SEXP mer_update_L(SEXP x)
00952 {
00953     return ScalarReal(update_L(x));
00954 }
00955 
00957 #define CM_MAXITER  300
00958 
00959 #define CM_TOL      1e-10
00960 
00961 #define CM_SMIN     1e-5
00962 
00972 static int update_u(SEXP x, int verb)
00973 {
00974     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
00975     int i, j, n = dims[n_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00976     double *Cx = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_CxSym),
00977         *sXwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtXWtSym),
00978         *res = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_residSym)), 
00979         *u = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uSym)),
00980         cfac = ((double)n) / ((double)q), 
00981         crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, step;
00982     double *tmp = Alloca(q, double), *tmp1 = Alloca(q, double),
00983         *uold = Alloca(q, double), one[] = {1,0}, zero[] = {0,0};
00984     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00985     CHM_DN cres = N_AS_CHM_DN(res, n, 1),
00986         ctmp = N_AS_CHM_DN(tmp, q, 1), sol;
00987     CHM_SP C = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym));
00988     R_CheckStack();
00989     
00990     if (!(L->is_ll)) error(_("L must be LL', not LDL'"));
00991     if (q > n) error(_("q = %d > n = %d"), q, n);
00992     if (!sXwt) error(_("sqrtXWt slot is empty in update_u"));
00993     if (Cx) {               /* A and C have the same structure */
00994         C = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
00995         R_CheckStack();
00996         C->x = (void*)Cx;
00997     }
00998     
00999     /* resetting u to zero at the beginning of each evaluation
01000      * requires more iterations but is necessary to obtain a
01001      * repeatable evaluation.  If this is not done the optimization
01002      * algorithm can take wild steps. */
01003     AZERO(u, q);
01004     update_mu(x);
01005     for (i = 0; ; i++) {
01006         
01007         Memcpy(uold, u, q);
01008         pwrss_old = update_L(x);
01009                                 /* tmp := PC %*% wtdResid */
01010         M_cholmod_sdmult(C, 0 /* notrans */, one, zero, cres, ctmp, &c);
01011         Memcpy(tmp1, tmp, q);
01012         apply_perm(tmp, tmp1, (int*)L->Perm, q);
01013                                 /* tmp := tmp - u */
01014         for (j = 0; j < q; j++) tmp[j] -= u[j];
01015                                 /* solve L %*% sol = tmp */
01016         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, ctmp, &c)))
01017             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_L) failed"));
01018         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
01019         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01020                                 /* evaluate convergence criterion */
01021         crit = cfac * sqr_length(tmp, q) / pwrss_old;
01022         if (crit < CM_TOL) break; /* don't do needless evaluations */
01023                                 /* solve t(L) %*% sol = tmp */
01024         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, ctmp, &c)))
01025             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed"));
01026         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
01027         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01028 
01029         for (step = 1; step > CM_SMIN; step /= 2) { /* step halving */
01030             for (j = 0; j < q; j++) u[j] = uold[j] + step * tmp[j];
01031             pwrss = update_mu(x);
01032             if (verb < 0)
01033                 Rprintf("%2d,%8.6f,%12.4g: %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g\n",
01034                         i, step, crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, u[1], u[2]);
01035             if (pwrss < pwrss_old) {
01036                 pwrss_old = pwrss;
01037                 break;
01038             }
01039         }
01040         if (step <= CM_SMIN || i > CM_MAXITER) return 0;
01041     }
01042     return i;
01043 }
01044 
01056 SEXP mer_update_u(SEXP x, SEXP verbP)
01057 {
01058     return ScalarInteger(update_u(x, asInteger(verbP)));
01059 }
01060 
01061 /* FIXME: change this to use the variance type slot.  If
01062  * dims[useSc_POS] is nonzero then use the formula for the profiled
01063  * deviance.  (Does everything work out nicely if sigma is identically
01064  * 1 when useSc is false?)
01065  */
01066 
01074 SEXP mer_update_dev(SEXP x)
01075 {
01076     double *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym));
01077     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
01078 
01079     d[disc_POS] = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym) ?
01080         lme4_devResid(REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muSym)),
01081                       REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_pWtSym)),
01082                       REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
01083                       dims[n_POS], dims[vTyp_POS]) :
01084         d[wrss_POS];
01085     d[ML_POS] = d[disc_POS] + d[ldL2_POS] + d[usqr_POS];
01086     return R_NilValue;
01087 }
01088 
01099 SEXP mer_update_ranef(SEXP x)
01100 {
01101     update_ranef(x);
01102     return R_NilValue;
01103 }
01104 
01105 #if 0
01106 /* FIXME: mer_create_A is probably better done in R code using Ztl,
01107  * not Zt */
01108 
01119 SEXP mer_create_A(SEXP Zt, SEXP ST, SEXP GpP)
01120 {
01121     SEXP ans;
01122     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *nnz, *nz, *vi, *vp, *zdims, *zi, *zp,
01123         Vnnz, ZtOK, j, nf = LENGTH(ST);
01124     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01125     R_CheckStack();
01126 
01127                                 /* Trivial case, all nc == 1 */
01128     if (ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, (double**)NULL, nc, nlev) <= 1)
01129         return duplicate(Zt);
01130                                 /* Check the nonzero pattern in Zt */
01131     zdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym));
01132     nnz = Alloca(zdims[1], int);
01133     nz = Alloca(zdims[0], int);
01134     R_CheckStack();
01135 
01136     zi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_iSym));
01137     zp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_pSym));
01138     for (j = 0, ZtOK = 1; j < zdims[1]; j++) {
01139         nnz[j] = C_nz_col(nz, j, nf, Gp, nc, nlev, zi, zp);
01140         if (nnz[j] != (zp[j + 1] - zp[j])) ZtOK = 0;
01141     }
01142     if (ZtOK) return duplicate(Zt);
01143                                 /* Must create a new dgCMatrix object */ 
01144     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dgCMatrix")));
01145     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_DimSym, duplicate(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym)));
01146     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_DimNamesSym, allocVector(VECSXP, 2));
01147                                 /* create and populate the p slot */
01148     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_pSym, allocVector(INTSXP, zdims[1] + 1));
01149     vp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_pSym));
01150     vp[0] = 0;
01151     for (j = 0; j < zdims[1]; j++) vp[j + 1] = vp[j] + nnz[j];
01152     Vnnz = vp[zdims[1]];
01153                                 /* create and populate the i slot */
01154     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_iSym, allocVector(INTSXP, Vnnz));
01155     vi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_iSym));
01156     for (j = 0; j < zdims[1]; j++) {
01157         int i, pos = vp[j];
01158         C_nz_col(nz, j, nf, Gp, nc, nlev, zi, zp);
01159         for (i = 0; i < zdims[0]; i++) if (nz[i]) vi[pos++] = i;
01160     }
01161                                 /* create and zero the x slot */
01162     SET_SLOT(ans, lme4_xSym, allocVector(REALSXP, Vnnz));
01163     AZERO(REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_xSym)), Vnnz);
01164 
01165     UNPROTECT(1); 
01166     return ans;
01167 }
01168 #endif
01169 
01180 static void
01181 P_sdmult(double *dest, const int *perm, const CHM_SP A,
01182          const double *X, int nc)
01183 {
01184     int *ai = (int*)(A->i), *ap = (int*)(A->p), m = A->nrow, n = A->ncol;
01185     double *ax = (double*)(A->x), *tmp = Alloca(m, double);
01186     R_CheckStack();
01187 
01188     for (int k = 0; k < nc; k++) {
01189         AZERO(tmp, m);
01190         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01191             for (int p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
01192                 tmp[ai[p]] += X[j + k * n] * ax[p];
01193         }
01194         apply_perm(dest + k * m, tmp, perm, m);
01195     }
01196 }
01197         
01206 static double update_RX(SEXP x)
01207 {
01208     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym)), *perm;
01209     int i, i1 = 1, j, k, n = dims[n_POS];
01210     int p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS], s = dims[s_POS];
01211     double *X = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_XSym)),
01212         *cx = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_CxSym),
01213         *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)), *fixef,
01214         *rzxy, *rxy = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym)),
01215         *sXwt = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sqrtXWtSym), *u,
01216         *y = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ySym)),
01217         dn = (double) n, dnmp = (double) (n - p),
01218         mone[] = {-1,0}, one[] = {1,0}, zero[] = {0,0};
01219     CHM_SP A = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
01220     CHM_DN cRCXy = AS_CHM_DN(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RCXySym)), ans, cu;
01221     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01222     R_CheckStack();
01223 
01224     rzxy = (double*)cRCXy->x;
01225     perm = (int*)L->Perm;
01226     if (sXwt) {                 /* Create W^{1/2}GHX in WX */
01227         double *WX = Calloc(n * p, double);
01228 
01229         AZERO(WX, n * p);
01230         for (j = 0; j < p; j++)
01231             for (k = 0; k < s; k++)
01232                 for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
01233                     WX[i + j * n] +=
01234                         sXwt[i + k * n] * X[i + n * (k + j * s)];
01235         if (cx) A->x = (void*)cx;
01236         else {                  /* Replace A by C */
01237             A = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_CmSym));
01238             R_CheckStack();
01239         }
01240         X = WX;
01241     }
01242                                 /* initialize RZX to PAX */
01243     P_sdmult(rzxy, perm, A, X, p);
01244                                 /* initialize RX to X'X */
01245     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &p, &n, one, X, &n, zero, rxy, &p);
01246                                 /* solve L %*% ans = PAW^{1/2}[X:y] */
01247     ans = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, cRCXy, &c);
01248     Memcpy(rzxy, (double*)(ans->x), q * p);
01249     M_cholmod_free_dense(&ans, &c);
01250                                 /* downdate X'X and factor  */
01251     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &p, &q, mone, rzxy, &q, one, rxy, &p);
01252     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &p, rxy, &p, &j);
01253     if (j)
01254         error(_("Downdated X'X is not positive definite, %d."), j);
01255                                 /* accumulate log(det(RX)^2)  */
01256     for (j = 0, d[ldRX2_POS] = 0; j < p; j++)
01257         d[ldRX2_POS] += 2 * log(rxy[j * (p + 1)]);
01258 
01259     if (SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_VSym) || SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_muEtaSym)) {
01260         Free(X);
01261         return d[ML_POS];
01262     }
01263                                 /* linear mixed models only */
01264     fixef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym));
01265     u = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uSym));
01266     cu = N_AS_CHM_DN(u, q, 1);
01267     R_CheckStack();
01268                                 /* solve L del1 = PAy */
01269     if (sXwt) {
01270         double *tmp = Calloc(n, double);
01271         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) tmp[i] = sXwt[i] * y[i];
01272         y = tmp;
01273     }
01274     P_sdmult(u, perm, A, y, 1);
01275     ans = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, cu, &c);
01276     Memcpy(u, (double*)ans->x, q);
01277     M_cholmod_free_dense(&ans, &c);
01278                                 /* solve RX' del2 = X'y - RZX'del1 */
01279     F77_CALL(dgemv)("T", &n, &p, one, X, &n, y, &i1, zero, fixef, &i1);
01280     F77_CALL(dgemv)("T", &q, &p, mone, rzxy, &q,
01281                     u, &i1, one, fixef, &i1);
01282     F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "T", "N", &p, rxy, &p, fixef, &i1);
01283     d[pwrss_POS] = sqr_length(y, n)
01284         - (sqr_length(fixef, p) + sqr_length(u, q));
01285     if (d[pwrss_POS] < 0)
01286         error(_("Calculated PWRSS for a LMM is negative"));
01287     d[ML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] +
01288         dn * (1 + log(d[pwrss_POS]) + log(2 * PI / dn));
01289     d[REML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] + d[ldRX2_POS] +
01290         dnmp * (1. + log(d[pwrss_POS]) + log(2. * PI / dnmp));
01291 
01292     if (sXwt) Free(y);
01293     return d[dims[isREML_POS] ? REML_POS : ML_POS];
01294 }
01295 
01303 SEXP
01304 mer_update_RX(SEXP x)
01305 {
01306     return ScalarReal(update_RX(x));
01307 }
01308 
01318 SEXP 
01319 mer_optimize(SEXP x, SEXP verbp)
01320 {
01321     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
01322     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym)),
01323         i, j, pos, verb = asInteger(verbp);
01324     int lmm = !(LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_muEtaSym)) ||
01325                 LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_VSym))),
01326         nf = dims[nf_POS];
01327 /* FIXME: need to add 1 to nv for GLMM with a scale par (maybe).
01328  * Not really but we do need to profile out the scale parameter when
01329  * useSc is TRUE. */
01330     int nv = dims[np_POS] + (lmm ? 0 : dims[p_POS]);
01331     int liv = S_iv_length(OPT, nv), lv = S_v_length(OPT, nv);
01332     double *g = (double*)NULL, *h = (double*)NULL, fx = R_PosInf;
01333     double *fixef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym));
01334     int *iv = Alloca(liv, int);
01335     double *b = Alloca(2 * nv, double), *d = Alloca(nv, double),
01336         *v = Alloca(lv, double), *xv = Alloca(nv, double);
01337     R_CheckStack();
01338 
01339     ST_getPars(x, xv);
01340     if (!lmm) {
01341         double eta = 1.e-5; /* estimated rel. error on computed lpdisc */
01342 
01343         Memcpy(xv + dims[np_POS], fixef, dims[p_POS]);
01344         v[31] = eta;            /* RFCTOL */
01345         v[36] = eta;            /* SCTOL */
01346         v[41] = eta;            /* ETA0 */
01347     }
01348                                 /* initialize the state vectors v and iv */
01349     S_Rf_divset(OPT, iv, liv, lv, v);
01350     if (verb) iv[OUTLEV] = 1;
01351                                 /* set the bounds to plus/minus Infty  */
01352     for (i = 0; i < nv; i++) {
01353         b[2*i] = R_NegInf; b[2*i+1] = R_PosInf; d[i] = 1;
01354     }
01355                                 /* reset lower bounds on elements of theta_S */
01356     for (i = 0, pos = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01357         int nc = *INTEGER(getAttrib(VECTOR_ELT(ST, i), R_DimSymbol));
01358         for (j = 0; j < nc; j++) b[pos + 2*j] = 0;
01359         pos += nc * (nc + 1);
01360     }
01361     do {
01362         ST_setPars(x, xv);              /* update ST and C */
01363 /* FIXME: Change this so that update_dev is always called and that
01364  * function does the selection of methods based on lmm. The Memcpy
01365  * call should always be used but the number of values to copy can be
01366  * zero. */
01367         if (lmm) {
01368             update_L(x);
01369             fx = update_RX(x);
01370         } else {
01371             
01372             Memcpy(fixef, xv + dims[np_POS], dims[p_POS]);
01373             update_u(x, verb);
01374             mer_update_dev(x);
01375             fx = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym))[ML_POS];
01376         }
01377         S_nlminb_iterate(b, d, fx, g, h, iv, liv, lv, nv, v, xv);
01378     } while (iv[0] == 1 || iv[0] == 2);
01379     update_RX(x);
01380     dims[cvg_POS] = iv[0];
01381     return R_NilValue;
01382 }
01383 
01384 /* Functions for sampling from a Wishart distribution */
01385 /* FIXME: Move these to the R sources */
01386 
01399 static double
01400 *std_rWishart_factor(double df, int p, int upper, double ans[])
01401 {
01402     int i, j, pp1 = p + 1;
01403 
01404     if (df < (double) p || p <= 0)
01405         error("inconsistent degrees of freedom and dimension");
01406     for (j = 0; j < p; j++) {   /* jth column */
01407         ans[j * pp1] = sqrt(rchisq(df - (double) j));
01408         for (i = 0; i < j; i++) {
01409             int uind = i + j * p, /* upper triangle index */
01410                 lind = j + i * p; /* lower triangle index */
01411             ans[(upper ? uind : lind)] = norm_rand();
01412             ans[(upper ? lind : uind)] = 0;
01413         }
01414     }
01415     return ans;
01416 }
01417 
01427 SEXP
01428 lme4_rWishart(SEXP ns, SEXP dfp, SEXP scal)
01429 {
01430     SEXP ans;
01431     int *dims = INTEGER(getAttrib(scal, R_DimSymbol)), i, j, k,
01432         n = asInteger(ns), psqr;
01433     double *scCp, *ansp, *tmp, df = asReal(dfp), one = 1, zero = 0;
01434 
01435     if (!isMatrix(scal) || !isReal(scal) || dims[0] != dims[1])
01436         error("scal must be a square, real matrix");
01437     if (n <= 0) n = 1;
01438     psqr = dims[0] * dims[0];
01439     tmp = Alloca(psqr, double);
01440     scCp = Alloca(psqr, double);
01441     R_CheckStack();
01442 
01443     Memcpy(scCp, REAL(scal), psqr);
01444     AZERO(tmp, psqr);
01445     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &(dims[0]), scCp, &(dims[0]), &j);
01446     if (j)
01447         error("scal matrix is not positive-definite");
01448     PROTECT(ans = alloc3DArray(REALSXP, dims[0], dims[0], n));
01449     ansp = REAL(ans);
01450     GetRNGstate();
01451     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01452         double *ansj = ansp + j * psqr;
01453         std_rWishart_factor(df, dims[0], 1, tmp);
01454         F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "U", "N", "N", dims, dims,
01455                         &one, scCp, dims, tmp, dims);
01456         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &(dims[1]), &(dims[1]),
01457                         &one, tmp, &(dims[1]),
01458                         &zero, ansj, &(dims[1]));
01459 
01460         for (i = 1; i < dims[0]; i++)
01461             for (k = 0; k < i; k++)
01462                 ansj[i + k * dims[0]] = ansj[k + i * dims[0]];
01463     }
01464 
01465     PutRNGstate();
01466     UNPROTECT(1);
01467     return ans;
01468 }
01469 
01470 /* MCMC sampling functions */
01471 
01479 static void MCMC_beta(SEXP x, double sigma)
01480 {
01481     SEXP fixefP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym),
01482         uvecP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uSym);
01483     int i1 = 1, j, p = LENGTH(fixefP), q = LENGTH(uvecP);
01484     int pp1 = p + 1;
01485     double *fix = REAL(fixefP), *uv = REAL(uvecP), mone = -1, one = 1;
01486     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01487     double *del1 = Alloca(q, double), *del2 = Alloca(p, double);
01488     CHM_DN sol, rhs = N_AS_CHM_DN(del1, q, 1);
01489     R_CheckStack();
01490 
01491     update_ranef(x);
01492                                 /* Update the fixed effects */
01493     for (j = 0; j < p; j++) del2[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01494     F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RXySym)),
01495                     &pp1, del2, &i1);
01496     for (j = 0; j < p; j++) fix[j] += del2[j];
01497                                 /* Update the orthogonal random effects */
01498     for (j = 0; j < q; j++) del1[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01499     F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, &mone, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_RCXySym)),
01500                     &q, del2, &i1, &one, del1, &i1);
01501     sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, rhs, &c);
01502     for (j = 0; j < q; j++) uv[j] += ((double*)(sol->x))[j];
01503     M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01504                                 /* Update the random effects */
01505     update_ranef(x);
01506 }
01507 
01516 static void MCMC_u(SEXP x, double sigma)
01517 {
01518 }
01519 
01520 static void
01521 safe_pd_matrix(double x[], const char uplo[], int n, double thresh)
01522 {
01523     int info, lwork = 3 * n, nm1 = n - 1;
01524     double *work = Alloca(3 * n, double),
01525         *w = Alloca(n, double),
01526         *xcp = Memcpy(Alloca(n * n, double), x, n * n);
01527 
01528     F77_CALL(dsyev)("N", uplo, &n, xcp, &n, w, work, &lwork, &info);
01529     if (info) error(_("dsyev returned %d"), info);
01530     if (w[nm1] <= 0) error(_("no positive eigenvalues!"));
01531     if ((w[0]/w[nm1]) < thresh) {
01532         int i, np1 = n + 1;
01533         double incr = w[nm1] * thresh;
01534         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) x[i * np1] += incr;
01535     }
01536 }
01537 
01538 static void MCMC_ST(SEXP x, double sigma, double *vals, int trans)
01539 {
01540     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
01541     int i, info, j, k, ncmax, nf = LENGTH(ST),
01542         *Gp = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym));
01543     double *rr = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym)),
01544         *scal, *var, *wfac, one = 1, zero = 0;
01545     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
01546     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01547     R_CheckStack();
01548 
01549     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
01550     scal = Alloca(ncmax * ncmax, double);
01551     wfac = Alloca(ncmax * ncmax, double);
01552     var = Alloca(ncmax * ncmax, double);
01553     R_CheckStack();
01554     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01555         int nci = nc[i], nl = nlev[i];
01556         int ncisq = nci * nci, ncip1 = nci + 1;
01557         
01558         AZERO(scal, ncisq);
01559         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &nci, &nl, &one, rr + Gp[i], &nl,
01560                         &zero, scal, &nci); 
01561         if (nci == 1) *scal = sqrt(*scal);
01562         else {
01563             safe_pd_matrix(scal, "L", nci, 1e-7);
01564             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &nci, scal, &nci, &info);
01565             if (info)
01566                 error(_("scal matrix is not pd after safe_pd_matrix!"));
01567         }
01568                                 /* generate random factor from std Wishart */
01569         AZERO(wfac, ncisq);
01570         std_rWishart_factor((double) (nl - nci + 1), nci, 1, wfac);
01571                                 /* form and store variance-covariance matrix */
01572         F77_CALL(dtrsm)("L", "U", "T", "N", &nci, &nci,
01573                         &one, wfac, &nci, scal, &nci);
01574         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &nci, &nci, &one, scal, &nci,
01575                         &zero, var, &nci);
01576         for (j = 0; j < nci; j++) {
01577             *vals++ = (trans ? log(var[j * ncip1]) : var[j * ncip1]);
01578         }
01579         for (j = 1; j < nci; j++) {
01580             for (k = 0; k < j; k++) {
01581                 *vals++ = (trans ? atanh(var[k + j * nci]/
01582                                      sqrt(var[j * ncip1] * var[k * ncip1]))
01583                        : var[k + j * nci]);
01584             }
01585         }
01586         if (nci == 1) {
01587             *st[i] = sqrt(*var)/sigma;
01588         } else {
01589             double *sti = st[i];
01590 
01591             for (j = 0; j < nci; j++) /* copy var to st[i] transposing */
01592                 for (k = j; k < nci; k++)
01593                     sti[k + j * nci] = var[j + k * nci];
01594                                 /* factor the variance-covariance matrix */
01595             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("L", &nci, sti, &nci, &info);
01596             if (info)
01597                 error(_("new var-cov matrix is not positive definite!"));
01598             for (j = 0; j < nci; j++) { /* convert to LDL' then TSST' */
01599                 for (k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
01600                     sti[k + j * nci] /= sti[j * ncip1];
01601                 sti[j * ncip1] /= sigma;
01602             }
01603         }
01604     }
01605 }
01606 
01616 static R_INLINE double MCMC_sigma(const int* dims, const double* d)
01617 {
01618     return (dims[useSc_POS] ? sqrt(d[pwrss_POS]/rchisq(RDF(dims))) : 1);
01619 }
01620 
01633 SEXP mer_MCMCsamp(SEXP x, SEXP savebp, SEXP nsampp, SEXP transp,
01634                   SEXP verbosep, SEXP deviancep)
01635 {
01636     SEXP Pars = PROTECT(mer_ST_getPars(x)), ans;
01637     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym));
01638     int dPOS = dims[REML_POS] ? REML_POS : ML_POS, i, j,
01639         nsamp = asInteger(nsampp),
01640         p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS],
01641         saveb = asLogical(savebp), trans = asLogical(transp),
01642         verbose = asLogical(verbosep), dev = asLogical(deviancep);
01643     double *ansp, *deviance = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
01644         *d = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym)),
01645         *fixef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)),
01646         *ranef = (double*)NULL;
01647     int nrbase = p + 1 + dims[np_POS]; /* rows always included */
01648     int nrtot = nrbase + dev + (saveb ? q : 0);
01649 
01650     if (nsamp <= 0) nsamp = 1;
01651     ans = PROTECT(allocMatrix(REALSXP, nrtot, nsamp));
01652     ansp = REAL(ans);
01653     for (i = 0; i < nrtot * nsamp; i++) ansp[i] = NA_REAL;
01654     GetRNGstate();
01655     if (verbose) Rprintf("%12s %14s\n", "sigma", "deviance");
01656     if (saveb) ranef = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym));
01657 
01658     for (i = 0; i < nsamp; i++) {
01659         double *col = ansp + i * nrtot, sigma;
01660                                 /* simulate and store new value of sigma */
01661         sigma = MCMC_sigma(dims, d);
01662         col[p] = (trans ? 2 * log(sigma) : sigma * sigma);
01663         update_ranef(x);        /* Conditional estimates of beta, u and b */
01664         MCMC_beta(x, sigma);    /* Update beta */
01665         for (j = 0; j < p; j++) col[j] = fixef[j]; /* Store beta */
01666         MCMC_u(x, sigma);
01667         if (saveb) {                               /* store b */
01668             update_ranef(x);
01669             for (j = 0; j < q; j++) col[nrbase + dev + j] = ranef[j];
01670         }
01671         MCMC_ST(x, sigma, col + p + 1, trans);
01672 /*      lmer_update_dev(x);     */ /* Refactor and evaluate deviance */
01673         /* FIXME: This deviance should be for sigma, beta, b, ST */
01674         if (dev) col[nrbase] = deviance[dPOS]; 
01675         if (verbose) Rprintf("%12.6g %14.8g\n", sigma, deviance[dPOS]);
01676     }
01677     PutRNGstate();
01678                                 /* Restore pars, refactor, etc. */
01679     mer_ST_setPars(x, Pars);
01680 /*     lmer_update_dev(x); */
01681 /*     lmer_update_effects(x); */
01682     UNPROTECT(2);
01683     return ans;
01684 }
01685 
01686 #ifndef BUF_SIZE
01687 
01688 #define BUF_SIZE 127
01689 #endif  
01690 
01704 static int chkDims(char *buf, int nb, SEXP x, SEXP sym, int nr, int nc)
01705 {
01706     SEXP MP = GET_SLOT(x, sym);
01707     int *dm = isMatrix(MP) ? INTEGER(getAttrib(MP, R_DimSymbol)) : (int*) NULL;
01708     if (!dm || !isReal(MP) || dm[0] != nr || dm[1] != nc)
01709         return snprintf(buf, BUF_SIZE,
01710                         _("Slot %s must be a numeric matrix of size %d by %d"),
01711                         CHAR(PRINTNAME(sym)), nr, nc);
01712     return 0;
01713 }
01714 
01727 static int chkLen(char *buf, int nb, SEXP x, SEXP sym, int len, int zerok)
01728 {
01729     int ll;
01730 
01731     if (!(ll = LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, sym))) == len && zerok && !ll)
01732         return snprintf(buf, BUF_SIZE, _("Slot %s must have length %d."),
01733                         CHAR(PRINTNAME(sym)), len);
01734     return 0;
01735 }
01736 
01745 SEXP mer_validate(SEXP x)
01746 {
01747     SEXP GpP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym),
01748         ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
01749         devianceP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym),
01750         dimsP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym),
01751         flistP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_flistSym);
01752     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *dd = INTEGER(dimsP);
01753     int i, n = dd[n_POS], nf = dd[nf_POS], nq, p = dd[p_POS],
01754         q = dd[q_POS], s = dd[s_POS];
01755     int nv = n * s;
01756     CHM_SP Zt = AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ZtSym)),
01757         A =  AS_CHM_SP(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ASym));
01758     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01759     char *buf = Alloca(BUF_SIZE + 1, char);
01760     R_CheckStack();
01761                                 /* check lengths */
01762     if (nf < 1 || LENGTH(flistP) != nf || LENGTH(ST) != nf)
01763         return mkString(_("Slots ST, and flist must have length dims['nf']"));
01764     if (LENGTH(GpP) != nf + 1)
01765         return mkString(_("Slot Gp must have length dims['nf'] + 1"));
01766     if (Gp[0] != 0 || Gp[nf] != q)
01767         return mkString(_("Gp[1] != 0 or Gp[dims['nf'] + 1] != dims['q']"));
01768     if (LENGTH(devianceP) != (wrss_POS + 1) ||
01769         LENGTH(getAttrib(devianceP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (wrss_POS + 1))
01770         return mkString(_("deviance slot not named or incorrect length"));
01771     if (LENGTH(dimsP) != (cvg_POS + 1) ||
01772         LENGTH(getAttrib(dimsP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (cvg_POS + 1))
01773         return mkString(_("dims slot not named or incorrect length"));
01774     if (L->n != q || !L->is_ll || !L->is_monotonic)
01775         return mkString(_("Slot L must be a monotonic LL' factorization of size dims['q']"));
01776     if (Zt->nrow != q || Zt->ncol != nv)
01777         return mkString(_("Slot Zt must by dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01778     if (A->nrow != q || A->ncol != nv)
01779         return mkString(_("Slot A must be dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01780     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_etaSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01781     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_fixefSym, p, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01782     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_muEtaSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01783     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_muSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01784     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_offsetSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01785     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_pWtSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01786     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ranefSym, q, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01787     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_residSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01788     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_sqrtrWtSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01789     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_uSym, q, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01790     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_VSym, nv, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01791     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_varSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01792     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ySym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01793     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_XSym, nv, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01794     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_RCXySym, q, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01795     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_RXySym, p, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01796 
01797     nq = 0;
01798     for (i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01799         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i), fli = VECTOR_ELT(flistP, i);
01800         int *dm = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
01801         if (!isMatrix(STi) || !isReal(STi) || dm[0] != dm[1])
01802             return
01803                 mkString(_("Slot ST must be a list of square numeric matrices"));
01804         if (Gp[i] > Gp[i + 1])
01805             return mkString(_("Gp must be non-decreasing"));
01806         if (!isFactor(fli))
01807             return mkString(_("flist must be a list of factors"));
01808         nq += dm[0] * LENGTH(getAttrib(fli, R_LevelsSymbol));
01809     }
01810     if (q != nq)
01811         return mkString(_("q is not sum of columns by levels"));
01812     return ScalarLogical(1);
01813 }
01814 
01815 /* Functions for the pedigree class */
01816 
01826 SEXP pedigree_chol(SEXP x, SEXP ans)
01827 {
01828     SEXP Sire = GET_SLOT(x, install("sire"));
01829     int *ai = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_iSym)),
01830         *ap = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_pSym)),
01831         *dam = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("dam"))),
01832         *sire = INTEGER(Sire), 
01833         i, j, n = LENGTH(Sire);
01834     double *ax = REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, lme4_xSym)), *F, Di, tmp;
01835 
01836     setAttrib(ans, install("F"), allocVector(REALSXP, n));
01837     F = REAL(getAttrib(ans, install("F")));
01838     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01839         int k, p = sire[i] - 1, q = dam[i] - 1;
01840         if (sire[i] == NA_INTEGER) {
01841             F[i] = 0;
01842             Di = (dam[i] == NA_INTEGER) ? 1 : sqrt(0.75 - 0.25 * F[q]);
01843         } else {
01844             if (dam[i] == NA_INTEGER) { /* sire only */
01845                 F[i] = 0;
01846                 Di = sqrt(0.75 - 0.25 * F[p]);
01847             } else {            /* both parents in pedigree */
01848                 Di = sqrt(0.5 - 0.25 * (F[p] + F[q]));
01849                 F[i] = NA_REAL;
01850                 if ((ap[i + 1] - ap[i]) > 1) {    /* skip if no progeny */
01851                     if (p > q) {j = p; p = q; q = j;} /* ensure p <= q */
01852                     for (j = 0, F[i] = 0; j <= p; j++) {
01853                         for (k = ap[j], tmp = 0;
01854                              k < ap[j + 1] && ai[k] <= q; k++) {
01855                             int ii = ai[k];
01856                             if (ii == p) tmp = ax[k];
01857                             if (ii == q) F[i] += tmp * ax[k]/2;
01858                         }
01859                     }
01860                 }
01861             }
01862         }
01863         for (j = ap[i]; j < ap[i + 1]; j++) ax[j] *= Di;
01864     }
01865     return ans;
01866 }
01867 
01868 /* NOTE: This function requires that missing parents be coded as zero */
01881 SEXP pedigree_inbreeding(SEXP x)
01882 {
01883     SEXP ans, sp = GET_SLOT(x, install("sire"));
01884     int i, j, t, n = LENGTH(sp), S, D;
01885     int *SI, *MI,               /* start and minor */
01886         *sire = INTEGER(sp),
01887         *dam = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, install("dam")));
01888     double *F = Alloca(n + 1, double), /* inbreeding coefficients */
01889       *L = Alloca(n + 1, double), *B = Alloca(n + 1, double);
01890     int *Anc = Alloca(n + 1, int),      /* ancestor */
01891         *LAP = Alloca(n + 1, int);      /* longest ancestoral path */
01892     R_CheckStack();
01893     
01894     F[0] =-1; LAP[0] =-1; /* set F and lap for unknown parents */
01895     for(i = 1, t = -1; i <= n; i++) {   /* evaluate LAP and its maximum */
01896         S = sire[i]; D = dam[i]; /* parents of animal i */
01897         LAP[i] = ((LAP[S] < LAP[D]) ? LAP[D] : LAP[S]) + 1;
01898         if (LAP[i] > t) t = LAP[i];
01899     }
01900     SI = Alloca(t + 1, int);
01901     MI = Alloca(t + 1, int);
01902     for(i = 0; i <= t ; ++i) SI[i] = MI[i] = 0; /* initialize start and minor */
01903     for(i = 1; i <= n; i++) {   /* evaluate F */
01904         S = sire[i]; D = dam[i]; /* parents of animal i */
01905         B[i] = 0.5 - 0.25 * (F[S] + F[D]); 
01906                                 /* adjust start and minor */
01907         for (j = 0; j < LAP[i]; j++) {++SI[j]; ++MI[j];} 
01908         if (S == 0 || D == 0) { /* both parents unknown */
01909             F[i] = L[i] = 0; continue;
01910         }
01911         if(S == sire[i-1] && D == dam[i-1]) { /* full-sib with last animal */
01912             F[i] = F[i-1]; L[i] = L[i-1]; continue;
01913         }
01914     
01915         F[i] = -1; L[i] = 1; 
01916         t = LAP[i]; /* largest lap group number in the animal's pedigree */
01917         Anc[MI[t]++] = i; /* initialize Anc and increment MI[t] */
01918         while(t > -1) { /* from the largest lap group to zero */
01919             j = Anc[--MI[t]]; /* next ancestor */
01920             S = sire[j]; D = dam[j]; /* parents of the ancestor */
01921             if (S) {
01922                 if (!L[S]) Anc[MI[LAP[S]]++] = S; 
01923                                 /* add sire in its lap group in Anc
01924                                  * array if it is not added yet and
01925                                  * increment the minor index for the group */ 
01926                 L[S] += 0.5 * L[j]; /* contribution to sire */
01927             }
01928             if (D) {
01929                 if (!L[D]) Anc[MI[LAP[D]]++] = D;
01930                 L[D] += 0.5 * L[j]; /* contribution to dam */
01931             }
01932             F[i] += L[j] * L[j] * B[j];
01933             L[j] = 0; /*clear L[j] for the evaluation of the next animal */
01934             if (MI[t] == SI[t]) --t; /* move to the next lap group when
01935                                       * all ancestors in group t have been
01936                                       * evaluated */
01937         } 
01938     }
01939     ans = PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, n));
01940     Memcpy(REAL(ans), F + 1, n);
01941     UNPROTECT(1);
01942     return ans;
01943 }
